column4: please help! when I start synaptic, the following error message occurs: http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/3981
Those repositories seem to be down
Just don't worry too much
just wondering if  it's down
Anyway, have a look at /etc/apt/sources.list and check the ones that fail
that's all the repositories i have in my /etc/apt/sources.list file enabled
Paste your sources.list in paste---
Or just use the normal ones. I'm having no problem
http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/3982
i used these repositories all the time, but today they stopped working somehow :(
what's yours? could you past one for me, please?
Use the ones for a nearby country
i tried to use fi.*, but they also didn't work :(
The server is working perfectly
I can browse yours perfectly...
then it must be something else :(
http://paste.ubuntulinux.nl/3983
thx, i've just run "apt-get update"
And did it work?
it is working, yes
As a matter of fact, if you use my last listed repository, you can get enlightenment DR17 -removing DR16), if you have any interest
thx, I'm satisfied with gnome :)
EvilPaddy, bur[n] er, after "apt-get update" synaptic worked
